subject: College Athletics
Women
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kimberly Hoffman scored 21 points and had 8 rebounds as Howard Payne defeated Messiah, 68-54, to win the Division III women’s championship in Holland, Mich.
snippet: Kimberly Hoffman scored 21 points and had 8 rebounds as Howard Payne defeated Messiah, 68-54, to win the Division III women’s championship in Holland, Mich.
